snippet: A lawmaker who gave away his adopted daughters to a man who later sexually assaulted one of them voted Friday to make such transfers a felony punishable by up to five years in prison.
lead_paragraph: A lawmaker who gave away his adopted daughters to a man who later sexually assaulted one of them voted Friday to make such transfers a felony punishable by up to five years in prison.

headline.main: Arkansas: Bill Would Prohibit Giving Away Children
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Bill Would Prohibit Giving Away Children
